data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 7,940 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Muscat.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Muscat, Oman
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Muscat who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Muscat an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Muscat to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Bathari people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Muscat to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Muscat access to a Bible in their own language.

data.section_summary:
the state of Muscat, Oman has a population of 1,215,500.

We estimate Muscat has 7,940 people who might know Jesus, 26,673 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,180,887 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 153 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Muscat to exponentially multiply disciples.
